revised_title: Furfurol: A New Series of Essential Oils and Their Derivatives
tldr: The author, John Stenhouse, discovered a new series of essential oils, furfurol, which can be produced by treating various plant materials with sulfuric acid. Furfurol has unique properties and can be converted into different compounds, such as furfuramide and furfurine. The author also discusses the process of preparing furfurol on a large scale and its potential applications.
